units.calculation: setCreate(formData, [ 'affordableHousingUnits'], get(formData, 'numberOfUnits') ? parseMoney(get(formData, 'numberOfUnits', 'numberOfUnitsSharedOwnership')) + parseMoney(get(formData, 'numberOfUnits', 'numberOfUnitsAffordable')) :0); setCreate(formData,[ 'numberOfUnitsTotal'], get(formData, 'numberOfUnits') ? parseMoney(get(formData, 'numberOfUnits', 'numberOfUnitsMarket')) + parseMoney(get(formData, 'numberOfUnits', 'numberOfUnitsSharedOwnership')) + parseMoney(get(formData, 'numberOfUnits', 'numberOfUnitsAffordable')) + parseMoney(get(formData, 'numberOfUnits', 'numberOfUnitsPRS')) + parseMoney(get(formData, 'numberOfUnits', 'numberOfUnitsOther')): 0);
